about_the_game:
The Craftomation 101 Mega Map of Self-Replicating Machines is a vast printable poster that showcases the most significant highlights and moments in the history of self-replicating machine concepts. Ideal for use as an educational poster in computer science classes or as unique desktop wallpaper.

Some enthusiasts print it out to hang in their offices and homes, while others use it to spark their children's curiosity about the tech world. Additionally, it serves as an excellent resource for school project research.

Included are links to legendary online courses that delve into self-replicating concepts.

Formats

  • FullHD
  • 4K
  • 4K Dark (best for wallpaper at desktop flooded with icons)
  • 8K
  • 16K
  • PDF (ready to be printed of almost any size)

By purchasing this Mega Map, you're supporting the game's development and gaining access to exclusive content that has been carefully curated for you.

To find the downloaded files, click the Right Mouse Button on the game in your Steam Library > Properties > Installed Files > Browse. You will find all the downloaded files in directories over there.
